name: NSW Student Report
description: New South Wales school report format
subjects: Personal Development, Health and Physical Education

achievement_scale.label: Outstanding
achievement_scale.description: Your child's achievement in this subject is outstanding. They confidently apply their knowledge and skills in a range of new and complex situations.

achievement_scale.label: High
achievement_scale.description: Your child's achievement in this subject is high. They confidently apply their knowledge and skills in a range of familiar and new situations.

achievement_scale.label: Expected
achievement_scale.description: Your child's achievement in this subject is at the expected standard. They apply their knowledge and skills in familiar situations.

achievement_scale.label: Basic
achievement_scale.description: Your child's achievement in this subject is basic. They apply their knowledge and skills in familiar situations with support.

achievement_scale.label: Limited
achievement_scale.description: Your child's achievement in this subject is limited. They apply their knowledge and skills in some familiar situations with significant support.

effort_scale.label: High
effort_scale.description: Your child actively participates and engages in most learning activities. They always try to complete and present work to a high standard.

effort_scale.label: Satisfactory
effort_scale.description: Your child actively participates and engages in most learning activities. They regularly try to complete and present work to the required standard.

effort_scale.label: Low
effort_scale.description: Your child sometimes participates and engages in learning activities. They occasionally try to complete and present work to the required standard.

social_development: Displays a positive attitude to learning
Respects the rights and property of others
